attributes.action: call an emidiate election as we the public have not given him a mandate to run this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We also believe that the Prime Minister's lack of charisma, and his inability to be honest with the country is adding to the overall feeling of economic uncertainty at this time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
